headline: Is Duke Energy (DUK) Pricing Reflect Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Performance
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Duke Energy's share price fairly reflects its long term potential, this breakdown is designed to help you judge the value for yourself. Duke Energy recently closed at US$121.35, with returns of 3.3% over the last week, 3.3% over the last month, 3.3% year to date, 12.3% over 1 year, 35.9% over 3 years, and 55.8% over 5 years. This provides plenty of history for a closer look at value. Recent coverage around Duke Energy has focused on its role as a major...
